title: I PAYED FOR RIOT POINTS AND DID NOT RECEIVE THEM!!!
body: someone help, i have spent 35 dollars on riot points and i am yet to receive them, what is the problem and is there a solution?

replies.body:
What happened was likely you bought the RP during the server issues last night. You'll have to do a couple of things.

First make sure the payment processed, check your bank account if you paid by card or paypal if you paid that way and check to make sure the payment was actually went through.

If it did go through and you just haven't received the points then [submit a support ticket ](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)under account and billing and they can help you get it sorted out.
